title: Falefia
data: Falefia is a village at the east end of Savai'i island in Samoa.[1] The village is part of the electoral constituency (Faipule District) Fa'asaleleaga I which is within the larger political district (Itumalo) of Fa'asaleleaga. The population is 415 (2006 Census).[2] 13°43′50.57″S 172°12′42.48″W﻿ / ﻿13.7307139°S 172.2118000°W﻿ / -13.7307139; -172.2118000 This article about a geographical location in Samoa is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
